queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-webui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-wcs}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-wfs}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-wms}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-rest}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.volumeMounts.name={{vol-local-gscloud}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-wfs}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-gsc-rest}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{spring}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
